[vc_row type=”container”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

The Accu-Beam® Direct Video Adapter connects C-mount cameras with most Microscopes and Ophthalmic Slit Lamps. It is the most compact C-mount adapter that we offer.

  • Most compact design for a video adapter
  • Various lens options to work with any camera
  • Works with any C-mount video camera
  • Focus-control to fine tune your image
  • Adjustable iris to regulate incoming light
  • Can mount to any Zeiss-style beamsplitter exit port

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_gallery type=”flexslider_slide” interval=”3″ images=”72772″ img_size=”400×267″ css=”.vc_custom_1574796744240{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_separator color=”#e5e5e5″ type=”normal” thickness=”1″ up=”” down=””][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Direct C-mount Video Adapter

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

The smallest C-mount adapter we offer, the Direct Video Adapter is a simple and cost-effective way to attach a camera to a beamsplitter. Unlike our other adapters the lenses cannot be changed and the X/Y adjustment is fixed. Without a right-angle prism, this adapter is best paired with a camera that has a “mirror/flip” feature.

Lens options include F35, F40, F50, and F65.

Part # 8100

U.S. Patent No. 5,264,92

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs color=”white” active_section=”1″][vc_tta_section title=”Compatibility” tab_id=”1569386751404-824b66ba-0d543ec4-eebb”][vc_column_text]

Compatible with Zeiss, Alcon, Leica/WILD, Moller-Wedel/Haag Streit, Topcon, Vasconcellos, Marco, Reichert, Shin Nippon, Takagi, Nidek, CSO, Appasamy, Burton, Woodlyn, KAPS, Seiler, Global and other manufacturers.

A Beamsplitter or Beamsplitter Adapter may be required.

Haag-Streit Disclaimer

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Regulatory” tab_id=”1569386751419-a33a2db6-6e3d3ec4-eebb”][vc_column_text]

The Direct Video Adapter is a class 1 device, and is approved to bear the CE mark.

TTI Medical is registered with the FDA and ISO 13485:2016 certified.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Warranty” tab_id=”1569387831165-1b59dea1-014a3ec4-eebb”][vc_column_text]

All of our products include a 1 year manufacturer’s warranty and support for the usable lifetime of the product.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row]
